text: Rekt Galaxies is a modification for the game FreeSpace 2. It is anything but a Mortal Engines videogame. In the game set in the same universe as the Mortal Engines film, you fly as a pilot for the Ancients and Vasudans fighting for the very survival against numerous threats, such as the Cylon Empire and various alien menaces. Category:Simulation video games
title: Rekt Galaxies
